attributes.action: put pressure on the FA to abandon proposals to move English Premier League fixtures overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of playing an additional 10 games a year is bad for the game. It will create an unfair league, ignoring the concept of all teams playing each other once at home and once away under the same conditions. It is bad for the fans as many will be unable to travel to support their team. It is bad for the players as we are always told they play too many games. 

It is a bad idea, motivated by how much more cash can be accumulated by the bigger clubs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
